Title: Excellent peroformance and visual quality
Comment: Everthing seems to be perfect with the phone. The only concern is if you keep 90hz refresh rate and play games with high visual settings, the battery seems to drain pretty quick. And since it does not have 3.5mm jack, using bluetooth headset aslo drastically reduces battery. If connected with type c to 3.5mm connector, it provides excellent battery life

Name: G.Sasidhar
Title: It is s good one in the price range
Comment: Fingerprint scanner is not that good but an average scanning capacity as it uses a light production on your fingers for scanning.Battery life is not so good but it's good and charging as you know 30W charging is damn fast.Rear camera is very impressive but front camera is not satisfactory.And oxygen OS as you know is too good with amoled screen with 90hz screen refresh rate.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Don't expect too much... you will definitely be satisfied with this model for the price you paid
Comment: Battery back up is approximately 13-16hrs...maximum.Camera is ok not something great not something bad.User interface is best..also 30k model is worth the money.Gaming wise works fine..neither tooo good or bad.Selfie camera is good.But in dark picture calrity is less.Overall a very satisfying phone within budget of 30k.Don't go for lesser storage 64GB. Not worth.

Name: Dinku
Title: Good for practical users
Comment: Pros:Best android skin Oxygen os (strength)More than sufficient power.Good battery lifeOnePlus servicesGood camara but not best in this price rangeExcellent display 90hzBuild quality üî• light weightCons:Not charging as fast as they said butCharging take one hour still good.No headphone jackNo memory Card slot

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Worst model from oneplus
Comment: Something wrong with this nord ...before models i used but this is not working properly as before models of oneplus

Name: Noman C.
Title: Camera Could have been better
Comment: The way Oneplus Nord was promoted was having all issues resolved from One plus 1 to one plus 8 and camera qualities. But actually scenario is differentPros:Edgy/sharp look and catchy colorhandyRAM and storage capacitySound qualityCons:Front camera is too grainy. After having two camera's also in front, clicked image quality would have been better.

Name: Tanishk Soni
Title: Camera
Comment: Don't buy this phone . If u r thinking for the oneplus' quality ,then u r wrong . Oneplus' quality  isn't provided in camera .Otherwise for gaming it is good but the camera is the most disappointing thing in the phone . Rear camera is good but the front camera is  really bad . And I don't know why i am not satisfied with the network speed . In my  old 4g phone it is much better than this phone.

Name: Ashish
Title: Defect in product
Comment: The device delivered me on Monday being a new phone with brand like a one plus Nord still I am facing some issue like battery low performance and heating problem and hanging issue with this device I request you to please refund my amount as soon as possible

Name: Deep Rajpal
Title: Do not get carried away with the price
Comment: I had a 1+ 6 before. I think that was better. If I had a choice to exchange this, I would do it and buy a 1+7t or a 1+8. It's heavy. No doubt the price is attractive. My phone hung 4 times while on a call. The screen quality is poor. U have to be on very high brightness to get the best colors. Battery Life is poor. They need to update a lotof software glitches. I hope they do soon.

Name: Sushant Yadav
Title: Great phone with not so great camera
Comment: Phone build is great. Blue color is just üî•. Everything is great. Charging is super fast. Only thing that I‚Äôd point out which is worst part of this phone is it‚Äôs camera. For a 30k smartphone the camera is super dud. Worse than 17-20k phones!!!

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Waste of money
Comment: Waste of money, no auto Cal recording option it's a common feature for now a days and it will not support 3rd party app also, few apps not downloading, and there is no refund option also in amazon for this product. Camera quality poor, don't waste money buying this product 27999/- it's wasted for me. And very very slow in transfer files from one mobile to other mobile. Strongly suggesting don't buy.

Name: hiren Kalathiya
Title: Value for money
Comment: Its a value for money. Its can be a perfect mid range phone for all the youngster like me!

Name: C srinivas
Title: Battery very poor
Comment: Battery drains out almost 25% for an hour battery very bad camera when compared Realme is bad Only brand name One plusI will check till tomorrow then decide

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Oneplus review
Comment: After a long wait got oneplus nord. Quite difficult to use from normal android to stock android. Some features are missing like radio , dial pad prediction, camera clarity is awesome in normal and nature condition. Bt in room light its quite dull. Overall a compact phone for buyers.. If u have skyhigh expectation this is not the phone. Budget oneplus proves again as budget one...

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Do Not Go For Nord!!
Comment: The camera is definitely not upto the mark. I am a OnePlus user from the past 6 years, but OnePlus Nord is a complete disappointment on the basis of a camera, knowing the cameras of OnePlus are too good. Plus, the battery life is not good as expected. I don't play any games on my phone, and yet the battery doesn't last long. I would definitely not recommend this phone for anyone.

Name: Ravindra singh
Title: Shows invalid sim card
Comment: Not happy..!!‚òπÔ∏è It works fine for one month but after that it started showing invalid sim card (Airtel) but, same card when I insert in other phone it works fine that means no problem with simcard. At the same time put a mail to customer care but their response is very poor.I am putting reminder on reminder but they are not responding.Suffering from last 15 days.

Name: Allu Nagabhushana Rao
Title: Poor camera
Comment: Good battery life. display is good.But Poor camera quality. For name sake 4 cameras are there. But 48MP has poor quality compared to it's 16MP. 48MP absolutely for marketing stunt.But for below 30k with 5g and SD u can go for it.

Name: xyz
Title: An experience which is equivalent to using an iPhone with an Android OS.
Comment: At this price point, this is an absolute steal. Be it Cameras. Software, Battery, etc. every features scores high marks. I don't use this phone for gaming. I didn't install any game ranging from small to a heavy game. For general usage, this phone promises a power packed performance.

Name: Abhi
Title: Awesome phone. An ex-iOS user
Comment: One Plus Nord is probably the best smartphone you can buy in this price range. I switched from iOS ecosystem and I don't miss my iPhone even a bit. The phone is blazing fast and the camera is phenomenal. 5 stars

Name: Riyaj A.
Title: Camera is like K20 pro. And the display is too much bad.
Comment: Every thing is good but camera is not good as I expected. This camera performance is like k 20 pro.If I don't play games max 6 hours battery life I get from the mobile. Display is too bad in the mobile. I can see pink and green colour in the display.

Name: Tamilanban.R
Title: One plus Nord is good mobile doesnt meet expectation
Comment: One plus mobiles are good but Nord didnt meet the expectation.ProsGood cameraBattery backup is goodConsNo audio jackNo sd card slotCall recording feature is not good. If you record some one call that will be notified to others by system generated message. If security is concerned if some other person record our call it should inform us

Name: Kamalahasan Chennai
Title: Performance wise okay but bad camera results
Comment: There's no lag at all & the performance is good.I expected better camera for this price .After my OnePlus 8pro returning I bought this temporarily.The camera was worst in low light & okay in daylight .Front can is totally not good even in good lightings.Simply my 3 year old POCOF1 beats in all aspects

Name: Brajesh kumar
Title: A complete package.. satisfied.. good buy
Comment: Overall good package...battery 7-8 hours screen on time with 90 hz.. without gaming...phone feels snappy...camera gets the job done...chosen this at over samsung m 51 at 24k..pixel 4a at 29k.. Although was not launched at that time.. screen tint issue... won't give any problem unless looking for it.. you will not regret if u go for it...almost a complete package at this price of 26750/-..4.4 üåü

Name: saurav
Title: Everything you could ask for.
Comment: It's everything you could ask for. It's a good daily driver. One plus is known for top service and updates and it's true. They are giving updates for camera and  software which makes the phone a mid range flagship phone.

Name: Afu
Title: Nord is worst phone
Comment: Worst product battery life is worst camera also not good

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Unhappy Customer
Comment: Battery drains out fast.Also when I send sms it always shows sending. Takes almost 1minute forbthe sms to be sent. Called Amazon and they booked me a tech visit. This is so bad of a company like one plus. This is my first purchase of one plus product and I am quite unhappy. Will not buy any other product of this brand.

Name: An honest customer!
Title: Why you shouldn't buy the phone
Comment: I bought this phone so that I can escape the mi use ad throw phones..but Nord didn't last for a week! Keeps crashing out of no reason!...one of the most terrible phone that I've ever acquired!I would be giving a one star if I wasn't the most generous man in the world!!

Name: Gaurav s.
Title: Not what you expected!
Comment: Ok so like others I was expecting a lot from one plus nord but I was disappointed. First the front camera I don't know what to say about it even a 14k phone can beat it in my opinion. Rear camera is good.i had one problem don't know if others faced the same or not when I use opera browser while browsing sometime the screen freez for some seconds don't know if it's the app problem or what. Rest is good i think.

Name: Kanyakumari
Title: Just ok
Comment: I have faced call recording issue...I want update to fix this issue...battery is also ok...not that much expecting...charging speed is better in just one hour fully charged from 0-100 ,and over all user experience is good...but in 28k I expected very much ....but I fell like it is under 20k..but I am happy with OnePlus Oxygen OS..

Name: Mahesh Togarsi
Title: Not quite impressed
Comment: I moved on from Motorola stock Android phone to One Plus Nord.I must admit, the web response is so sluggish in One Plus Nord.Simple web updates like Google weather and Google maps refused to show me the results in decent time duration.Am not quite impressed so far with Nord phone. I expected some good return on my investment on this phone..

Name: Siva
Title: Everything is great but for the camera
Comment: The build quality is good, battery lasts a day and half and charges quickly. The UI is good with no clutter. Very fast and responsive. Oneplus should really invest in a good camera app that can improve the pictures taken. The phones does scratch quite easily so a phone cover is a must.

Name: Anand Prakash
Title: Delivered Defective phone and worst Amazon return/replacement policy
Comment: Delivered Defective phone, it was not charging at all. Seems to be issue with Battery and also with Speaker. Very disappointed with Product. Raised the concern to Amazon support and they said technician will visit to check the issue but it him 4 days to visit. After so much of push they are now returning the product although i wanted to get the replacement.

Name: jaymin rajguru
Title: Mobile: Worth Money, Amazon: Worth platform
Comment: I found the color very attractive, though there is an air bubble in the back body of the phone, I raised a replacement and the technician visited me the very next day. The phone will be replaced within 4-5 days says him. I would like to thank Amazon for their prompt service.üòä

Name: Ravi
Title: Near the best
Comment: Display - Very Good (Best thing in phone)Camera - Good (wide range and nightscape is very good)Processor - Very Good (haven't tried gaming)Battery - Good (Charger is very good)Looks - Very Good (its Plastic body feels and looks like glass)System - Very Good (has good features for ease of use)Overall it's VERY GOOD phone with this price for OnePlus and 5G ready phone.

Name: Sharon
Title: Great Mobile
Comment: Everything is perfect , except battery life. It drains little, without using the mobile much.

Name: SUNNY MEVAWALA
Title: WORST DEVICE OF ONEPLUS, Plz do not buy
Comment: Very very unexpected device from oneplus, its very delicate.pubg is not supporting, so bad news for pubg lovers .Too many software updation issues.Even the simplest thing google is also not working properly.Even customer executives have not solution.They can only do a software update, but that is meaningless & not usefull to solve the problemsMy review is 1 out of 5.

Name: Jitesh Agarwal
Title: Amazing phone
Comment: After using it for 6 days.Pros:1) Great battery life.2) Oxygen OS3) Warp charging is super.4) Great for moderate usage.5) Good camera.6) 5G ready.7) Fingerprint reader and face unlock is superfast.Cons:1) Protect the screen using screen guard/tempered glass asap.2) Camera was not my priority.(that's why listed good camera in Pros)

Name: chandrasekhar sethi
Title: Just Too Damn Good...
Comment: All the things fingerprint reader is working fine,battery goes for more than a day if u don't use location related apps and less gaming,camera quality is on par and it can easily be said best camera yet the clarity and quality are just awesome,gaming mode helps u suppress the notifications..

Name: Deepak
Title: Stunning!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Comment: Highly recommended to all who are all wish to buy under 30k. Clean UI, Amazing performance, Nice camera, Good battery backup with lightning charging speed and good audio quality.I tested multiple times, there is no tint issue at all. No heating issue. Worth for each and every penny. Just go for it.My first 1+ device after Moto x, IPhone 5s and Galaxy s7 edge.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Just go for it...
Comment: No complaints at all from this device...Battery lasts longer than I expected.Camera is good to even in low light condition.90 Hertz display makes it even more smoother.UI is better than any other Chinese brands phone.Sound quality is bit above than average.30 Watt wrap charging is good too.Overall, this phone has everything pretty much u could expect at this price range :)

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: OnePlus Nord battery
Comment: My first OnePlus, maybe I expected a lot. But as per the price, this is what we get, right?IDK but battery doesn't stay longer it drops compared to other OnePlus, as my friend has OnePlus 6. His battery is much better, but it's 3000mah and Nord is some 4110 mAh. Thou it should stay longer than 6. It drops. As for me it's too soon to say as it's been a day since I got it. So let's hope for good.

Name: vijayavendan
Title: Nord is premium phone.
Comment: I have pre-ordered the one plus Nord.Camera is Quality Good.face unlock and In-display fingerprint is good.90Hz display quality smoother scrolling experience.Problem with the volume up key. When phone is on Ring mode automatically changing to vibrate mode. I have totally disappointed with the phone

Name: Pradeep v
Title: Not worth for money
Comment: Product delivered 4-sept,but it's not up to the mark,we r using another mobile other branded one with same configurations.that one is so much better than nord.request every one to not go with this.price and quality not in sync.worth for only 20k-22k.better go with other branded in the range.i really dissatisfied with this nord.video clarity not good and selfy is looks like normal.

Name: Nishant
Title: camera (more than average) and overall performance(very good)
Comment: Budget friendly. but if u prefer camera, then go for pixel 4a, otherwise everything is better than any phone in this price range. better save money by buying 8gb variant.no issues till now. must buy bullets wireless z for a good experience. works well with oneplus devices. bass is average. highs are good. front camera might be better than 1+ 7 and 8 models. OIS is very good.

Name: karthikpr
Title: Display issue.
Comment: DISPLAY issue. Disappointed .. Returning..Had purchased it for my mom.. it was birthday gift. Noticed a black spot on the screen.Have to wait for next sale.The hype created by OnePlus as well as Amazon might have worked with good sale, being a premium customer I would just rate you guys 1.Don't just end up with SORRY.. look for an alternative.Thank you!

Name: Dibya Saha
Title: Does a pretty decent job!
Comment: Been using this phone for a week now. Pretty premium and lag free experience. The main camera is the real deal and does everything. Other cameras on the rear are pretty much useless. The front cam is decent. The oxygen os is running smooth and the display is great. One downside is the battery. I have to charge the phone multiple times a day. Maybe an update could fix this.

Name: vijay
Title: Battery and camera qulaity not good..
Comment: One plus nord not reached expectations...it camera quality not good.And battery can't sustain for a day also...And sim support also not good...But look is good ..But this much worth for this mobile not good...They have to improve more..

Name: Chandra Sekhar Balla
Title: Not expected..
Comment: Not gonna talk about good things as they r good already, not so good things below- Battery backup not so good. Changed to 2 stars.. bad bad battery..- camera quality not top notch in this price range..

Name: Rohit
Title: Wow
Comment: Very very very nice mobile thanks to amazon and one plus nord

Name: Mohammad Zakir
Title: Calling issue
Comment: I bought this device first before one month but i got some problem in that device. Problem was that call was disconnecting automatically so i just replaced that one then i got new one again i am facing this kind of problem why i don't understand. Is it genuine or only i am facing it this problme. I unable to understand what i have to do. I have to keep this device to my self or back to amzone.

Name: Ranjith kumar
Title: very worst phone
Comment: very very worst phone & i never seen before.too costperformance very baddisplay clarity averageNo auto call recordingearspeaker clarity badtotally disappointedplease don't buy.

Name: Farhan
Title: What I think about one plus
Comment: Hii ordered on 6th aug and I was happy when it delivered on 7th aug deliverey is so fast and goodI use one plus Nord 3 days it's totally fineI was happy that I buy one Plus nordBut in free fire OnePlus nord ping was veri high in mobile data but on wife it's gooodThat one problem I faceI hope OnePlus get and solve this problemOverall this phone is amazing üòç

Name: Ashutosh
Title: Faulty product
Comment: I have bought one plus nord 8th october and gifted my wife after she start the mobile one week after recieving, the phone is 256 gb memory and 12 gb ram. It freezes all the time and randomly restarting many times a day means 4 to 5 times in an hour cannot use anything in phone os version is 10.5.8.I regret my decision buying nord. Anybody has idea when it will resolve.

Name: Ajay Narke
Title: Not satisfied
Comment: -Indoor Camera performance Not at all goodimages looks blurry worst than redmi note 8 pro-Display also looking more yellow i don't know is this only with me or some else also having-Display looks more oily (yellow shading)-Without using any thing battery drains 20 to 30 % over night- Screen doesn't look softer its look like more colour are there

Name: Sudhanshu
Title: Best in Budget
Comment: oxygenos is beast... What it is known forCamera performance not best but it's goodOther  specs are good in this budget if u r looking for complete package then this is  the one u should consider.. Speaker quite loud and clear .. firing speaker.. u will not miss  Dolby Atmos feature...Battery in 90hz refresh rate less backup but in 60 hz it stand for 1 day with atmost usage..

Name: Harikrishnan
Title: Average phone
Comment: Phone covering all the bases but not to top notch1. Average battery life2. Good camera but still needs improvement3. Display is good4. Speaker loud enough5. Connectivity issues here and there

Name: Manu VJ
Title: User Experience.
Comment: Pro Mode in Camera is quite good.Average 6 hours battery life.Excellent 5GHz wifi reception. (Very rare in buget phones)90 Hz display is awesome.Macro and depth camera is waste of money.Front camera videos are not that sharp in artificial lighting. ( 9W LED in room )Pink tint issue when using at night (acceptable, only when you are using in dark mode)

Name: Sushovit Rout
Title: Amazing phone
Comment: Got this legend delivered to me today on Occasion of Teacher's day. Wanted to gift my dad for his birthday this month. Advance bday gifts are most welcome. He loved the phone. Initial set up is in progress. Finally delighted to be part of red cable club family.

Name: Ajay Kumar Agrawal
Title: BAD SCREEN ON TIME
Comment: It doesn't have a good screen on time.Yesterday it had a Sot of 4 hrs..Plz help me any way possible..If there's a solution,tell me as soon as possible

Name: Sadhna sapra
Title: Disappointed
Comment: Preferably stay away from this phone. Not a good OS even if it's higher version than the previous one's. Probably one plus wanted to just bring out a cheap phone in this segment with lot of features but just could not deliver on the quality like it used to. Heating issue, battery issue, network reception issue. Bad .. disappointed and stuck qith this phone

Name: NIDHI MANDVE
Title: Call gets disconnect after 1 - 2 minutes.
Comment: Bought this mobile from Amazon and since starting this device is causing call trouble. 90% of the calls gets disconnected after 1-2 minutes and SIM shows switched off status to the caller. Poor Mobile from a reputed brand . Don't buy this faulty product.

Name: Sai Surya teja
Title: K
Comment: Not up to the mark

Name: akshay suresh
Title: New improved Nord
Comment: I got my nord on August 26th since it was a August manufactured unit. I don't see any pink or green tinting issue when brightness is lowered and the phone comes with oxygen OS 10.5.3 out of the box and after updating it to 10.5.5 the screen on time of the phone has drastically improved. According to my preliminary usage  i can say that the Nord is definitely a top phone to consider under 30k.

Name: mohit dubey
Title: Best 5G mobile at this range,,ü§≥
Comment: I m fully satisfied with this product üëåüòâI have purchased both color1- for my friend (gray Onyx)2- for myself (Blue Marble)Lookwise both r very prettyPerformance of mobile is too goodRam 12 GB and internal storage 256 GB , Oxygen OS , 90 Hz refresh rate of screen makes the phone quite fine selection of buyerOverall Value for money üëåüëå product

Name: Wasti
Title: OnePlus Nord is not just Smart it is Super smart
Comment: OnePlus nord is not a flagship phone but it is not lesser then those flagship phones, its camera quality is awsome and battery is very good, fingerprint scanner works fantastically. Graphics are good while playing heavy games, which is due the its processor and OnePlus Oxygen OS. I strongly recommend this phone. This is the one that we want in our pocket.

Name: Harish
Title: Horrible phone. Don't buy
Comment: Lot of issues in this phone. We have one plus 5. That's really good product. But this is really horrible. Many problems. Mainly battery draining very fastly. Calculator not taking numbers smoothly. Proximity sensor issue. Some time fingerprint not works. Don't buy this one. I ordered and then returned this again.

Name: Santhosh Om C
Title: Waste of Money 30000.00
Comment: Not up to the mark of expectation, battery life too pathetic, second sim frequently out of service and need to restart. Most commonly amazon gives one month return policy, in this case only 7 days, at least will take 15 days to get an idea on new launch. Wasted money of 30000.00

Name: Murali Mohan
Title: Value for money
Comment: Not upto expectation.. Camera is not upto mark.. Expected more rather.. Google maps doesn't work properly and so it chrome at times.. Cal recording facility is not like in earlier models.. It's disappointing actually.. Rest other things are good.. And value for money!!

Name: R
Title: Other than camera - everything else is best in class
Comment: The screen is snappy. No bloatware. Customizable, without 3rd party apps. Rear camera is average - photos are not lifelike. Some bugs are there - but I am assuming they'd be resolved with updates. Charges quicky. Build quality is good too.

Name: Rishi Mohan
Title: An underdog that you shouldn't overlook...
Comment: Don't believe some reviews, a flawless unit of this phone is easily a 7 and a half hour screen on time phone and bump it's refresh rate down to 60Hz, and I get 9 and a half to 10 hours of screen on time.Brightness is at auto.The standby time is also something to brag about.Install any G-Cam Mod and instantly, the camera quality goes up.

Name: Srinivas
Title: Worst mobile interns of battery n camera
Comment: Battery life is very very less full battery is not at all coming even 5 hours.After enabling the battery saver mode also. in battery saver showing the remaining battery life but it's not at all accurate.Very very disappointed with the battery life as well as camera .every pic the image quality is blurred.My previous mobile MI A1 far better than this one plus nord.

Name: Romit Solanki
Title: Beast Phone Under 30K Camera needs Improvement.
Comment: One of the Best Smartphones Under 30K apart from camera everything is superb Smooth... Excellent Is with No bloatware...90HZ RR..Battery Is excellent last a Day...Superb Fast Charging Warp Charging 30V.It Needs *Camera Improvement* for sure..Photos are not Upto Mark wat has been Advertised.Cheers 4/5

Name: RAVI KIRAN CH
Title: Can buy without any doubt.
Comment: Finger print reader fast ,Battery drains fast but charging is very fast due to 30W fast charger,Good quality camera as well as video recording.No problems found so far ,12GB+256GB combination makes to buy this phone,no other brand offers in this price with 48MP üì∑.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Not upto 1+ standard and my expectation
Comment: Writing review after using one month. This phone has heating issues if i use more than one hour continuously. Don't buy if you are a gamer. Battery lasts less than one day. Delivery is also too late and I don't like the packaging(phone cover damaged).

Name: Gowtham sai
Title: Just awesome!!!!! No words to sayy ü§©
Comment: My review after usage of 6 days  !!  The phone is just op(overpowerful) ! Without hesitating just go for it..... Camera is  superb. U can see my pics the difference in 12mp and 48mp .Overall superbbb no lag at alll the display is awesome.Fingerprint is rapid quick....that's it I can't say anything!! Just go for it. But a small tint issue , wish it will be vanished by next update !

Name: Dipesh Sakpal
Title: Overall good with this price range compare to other brands
Comment: Phone looks goodPerformance quite good no prob while PLAYING game like CODScreen looks goodCamera is not great but decent inough hope that will improve with updatePhone is light weightCall quality is goodPhone get quick charge with wrap chargingI have 12gb ram varientAs am used to with it's oxigen Os

Name: Samay Adlakha
Title: Premium experience at not so premium price.
Comment: Oxygen os is the main highlight of this phone. It gives this phone a premium feel. And that's what makes this phone far better than other phones in this price segment. Fingerprint reader is awesome. Camera is decent, macro camera should be improved, but overall camera is good.Battery is sufficient given that this phone has 30w warp charger so battery is not a issue.Overall this phone is pretty good at a pretty great price.

Name: Pritha
Title: Great phone, require some minimal changes considering indian customers...
Comment: Beast phone in terms of look, design, and oxygen os experience. But battery shoud be more when compared to other competitors in market. Headphone jack should not be removed. Otherwise a good package. This small changes need to be done in oneplus phone, that will be make the phone more Powerful in its segment.

Name: Anshay Jain
Title: Decent camera & Battery Life
Comment: It's been a week that I'm using this phone and th camera is not that good. Nightscape is bad. Battery life is worthy. Otherwise the phone is really good in this price and name. Would recommend to buy this if it falls in budget or go for cheaper brands with similar config

Name: raghu
Title: #worst camera
Comment: Camera quality at this price is really disappoing , there is a lag between shttur speed and image processing. Recommended NOT TO BUY if you are looking for good camera. God knows how they rollout product in market without basic camera testing . NOT HAPPY WITH THE PURCHASE , ITS BETTER TO GO FOR SOME OTHER BRAND.

Name: Prateek Maheshwari
Title: Good purchase
Comment: The phone works very wellCamera quality is amazingThe battery life is good till nowThe specs are great and the price point makes this a very attractive purchase

Name: Pranav
Title: Almost perfect phone with maximum specs offered for this price range..!!
Comment: Having used the 12GB 256 GB variant for close to 2 months, I can clearly say that it meets the expectations just right. No lag, extremely well optimized OS, smooth 90Hz display is a real treat. Multi tasking is pretty fluid. Warp charging is great. Full charges in close to 1hour and 15 minutes. In-hand feel is great. Doesnt give that plastic frame feel ever. And its 5g ready, whenever that is ready. Extremely happy with this purchase

Name: Kayyum Shaikh
Title: Nice phone
Comment: After 1 month uses I am giving completed review. Performance is very good. Battery life also good but in standby mode battery consumption is high. Camera quality is very good but selfie camera is not as per the expectations of 32 MP. Charging is very fast, in 50 minutes full charge.Volume is loud and clear. Call connectivity is also nice.Overall phone is very nice.

Name: Lakshman
Title: One of the best mid rang mobile(expect call recording feature)
Comment: Super mobile exclantBut call recording feature is to bad when we are starting to record the others person in call can lesan the voice of system (now your call is recordedü§Ø and when we are offing call recordingü§Ø now your call recording has stopped) like that it is tellingBetter to fix this issue in next update.Expect record the oneplus nord is super i will giveüòâ 5 stars (expect call recordingüòë)

Name: Saptarshi Bandyopadhyay
Title: Pre-book Delivery Rocks üíô
Comment: Got it one day prior to the sale starts, which was quite unexpected. Great Job Team #Nord and #amazon üíôReally such beautiful features in this price."Never Settle" ü§ü

Name: Shreeraj Tanawade
Title: I Loved My Nord
Comment: The camera quality is way more glnetter and a difgerent than other phones. Its OIS makes the camera mpre special. The 90hz refresh rate is like butter. But one cons about this phone is that it heats up when its charging. Some times the face unlock dont respond even if the face unlock symbol is upfront indicating. But this would be the one of the best phones you will get at this price.

Name: PAWAN D.
Title: Battery Backup, Heating,low light camera issue
Comment: Battery Backup not as expected.According to reviews its a gaming smartphone, i bought 12gb varient of nord but battery backup was not so good as compared to oneplus other phone.mobile heat too much after just using 15% while in room without fan or AC.Comparing to other phone of oneplus low light camera quality is poor.Rest all very good except the above points.

Name: Masood
Title: Worst Phone - waste of money
Comment: Finger print doesn't work properly sometimes, battery draining very fast and camera quality not upto the mark. Mainly I use call recording and in nord everytime I have to click record and after clicking voice msg come recoding started which other persons can also hear which is not good for me. Because of this I started dislike One plus.

Name: Sanjay
Title: One of the top phone under 30k
Comment: Overall the user experience of the phone is good. The display is impressive, 60 hz refresh rate make everything smooth... The processor is good and it's quite fast. It gives a feel of almost a flagship. Only area of concern is average quality low light photography. But I think for  a phone under 30k..it's can be ignored.Design is awesome.

Name: Sonu revadi
Title: Not bad
Comment: Out of 10Battery life - 7Display - 8Gaming -6Camera -8.5Fast charging -9Sound - 6Design-9.5I experienced few issuesEven after closing apps( Like Facebook, Instagram, YouTube), it takes about 1 second to turn the audio off.Automatically rebooted during a voice call.Average Face unlock performance.

Name: hamdan patel
Title: Awesome phone
Comment: Dual sim phone with speedy operation, good camera. Good battery backup with quick charge. It takes 1 hr for battery to get fully charged.

Name: ejo3132
Title: Average camera performance
Comment: Indoor camera performance is just average. Not worth this price. I sold the phone ovrr olx snd bought a poco x2. If camera is your first priority,then a BIIIIG NOOOO to NORD. Poco x2 which is almost 10k lesser than the jord gives much better pictures.

Name: Karthik
Title: Classy
Comment: A perfect mid ranger with everything made out of oneplus  7 and 8. Better battery, 6 cameras,12 GB ram, better screen, 5G . A perfect touch of everything.

Name: Mayur
Title: Classic Phone!
Comment: I don't know why people are expecting so much flagship features in this price and comparing it with onplus 8 camera. Oneplus Nord is already very well performing.Camera is great.Getting 8 hours of screen on time on normal usage.Screen is extremely smoothOnly con is no 3.5mm jack.......but it's manageable..Don't think twice just go for it.....

Name: Anonymous
Title: Simply Value for money...
Comment: Faster fingerprint reader... Battery life is better, not extraordinary... Using GCam gives you more effect than stock camera... Simply a nice one...

Name: NEERAJ DAYAL TYAGI
Title: OnePlus Nord :  A Bad buy by me. üò™
Comment: As compared to my old Poco f1 more than a tad lower in :-Net access.Display of Nord is Grey on a off-white screen.Not as soothing to the eyes in visibility as Poco f1.Sound quality is far too ordinary.Overall I think I made a mistake in purchasing this phone.N D Tyagi

Name: Gauthaman
Title: Worth the wait and money....
Comment: Been using it for 2 weeks now.... The battery is good and lasts for a day with moderate usage. There is no display tint issue as said by many users. The camera quality is however a bit low compared to other flagship models.. the colour saturation in camera is low comparatively with my OnePlus 7. But overall it's worth the money. Certain features could improve with updates like camera.

Name: Biswajit D.
Title: Very nice mobile in this price range I bought for 25k after hdfc and exchange offer
Comment: Good, but not like flagship OnePlus , flagship OnePlus gesture like yuga animation and speak caller ID are not in OnePlus nord , otherwise mobile is good enough close to OnePlus flagship mobile. I was use this for 2 months now everything is good running condition.

Name: Himanshu Jain
Title: Good phone, smooth to work, bad battery!!!
Comment: I have use it for almost 25 days. So after using is normally and rigrously my review is:Pros-Good screen qualitySound is loudSmooth to play games such as pubg, CODHuge RAMno lagging when multitaskingCons-Battery drains very fast in normal use also. I was hoping better battery performanceSlight heating up while chargingSlow fingerprint sensor than OnePlus 7T

Name: Mandar Bapat
Title: Good for the price, but battery performance is worst
Comment: Using this phone for last 15 days:Pros:1. Easy to use2. Super fast3. Looks4. Camera is good surprisingly, which was not expectedCons:1. The battery of phone is worst, only annoying things about this phone is it's charging and it's quite bad. Better u have a charger with you always and a battery bank.Yes, fast charging helps but man the charging drains like flash.

Name: Pavan Kumar Kotnani
Title: Medium Budget - Not a Flagship phone but worth for the money
Comment: As this mobile is in medium budget range, the features are good and worth for the money.These are the drawbacks which I have observed after using this mobile for 15 days- Plastic coating- No Dolby sound support- No 3.5 mm audio jack- Front 8 MP camera not good under low light- Not Water resistant

Name: Damyanti D.
Title: Value for money
Comment: ¬†Value for money smart phoneüì± , with the oneplus trust and brand name , i can easily buy realme x3 or redme k20 pro , but brand name does matter a lot , oneplus 7t is also a good phone to consider nearby this price but latest things are always good over old one even if they are quit more goodüî• .  (Note- nord do not have good flashlight)üòÖ

Name: Sukesh varma
Title: Average phone but worth it
Comment: Pro,sSmooth displayOxygen osDecent camera (back)Premium designSmooth game play experienceCon,sWorst front cameraWorst battery lifeUseless micro cameraStruggling single,sSome time screen brightness coler,s changeStruggling low light photographyImage ober exposed

Name: Anurag Thampi Anil
Title: Oneplus Nord 12gb gb variant - Bang for the buck!!
Comment: this is my 2nd oneplus device after using oneplus 3t. I have seen many negative reviews abt nord. So on 1st sale, one of my best frnd bought 12gb variant. So after seeing his pretty good satisfied experience, i decided to go for 12gb nord. I bought it on 30th Aug. I'm still highly satisfied.. display is superb in terms of smoothness. For me, cam is quite good and take colorful pics. Aslo getting very good battery baclup.

Name: Ashish Ranjan
Title: nord(12+256) review based on 2 weeks of usages
Comment: i used OnePlus nord(12+256) for more than  a week and based on that i can conclude that...advantage1. display quality is very good also 90hz refresh ratio added plus point2. speakers are very good and Clear3. performance is also good.disadvantage1. 3.5 earphone jacküòê is not available so you need to either go for Bluetooth one or c type2. camera is little bit artificial in color.

Name: Vipin Pal
Title: Call recording feature is missing
Comment: Overall phone is good but not satisfied with it's UI and high price with this package,Big issue of not available of call recording inbuilt feature.its made sad to meüò≠üò≠

Name: AMAL P V
Title: Don't buy this cheap product by OnePlus
Comment: The worst phone by OnePlus.I returned my 1st device because it was having network problem and little tint issue was there.I got the new device which having serious display tint issue.One sode of my display is pink and other side is green.The pink and green tint visible even in day light condition and in every application even while watching movies also.Camera is also average.Iam going to refund my money

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Killer,nord lit..
Comment: You may get another brand phone under this price..but I repeat with this killer performance , absolute display clarity with flow glossy appearance,and camera quality no other OnePlus device comes under 30k...I have been using nord since a month,new upadtes are getting perfectly and with that upadtes performance also get improved..overall a great brand piece under this budget is awesom

Name: NaaG Kosanam
Title: Top in the Worst mobile list.
Comment: ¬†12GB + 256 GB Blue variant :1. Lag in updating the photo,which was opened from gallery option in camera.2. Too much beautification in photos those are taken using front camera( I think girls no need to do makeup for taking photos because this phone did it).3. Its better not to talk about Battery performance because its too worst.

Name: Titas
Title: Expectations hurt!! But hope for the best
Comment: ¬†Camera quality is not up to the level. However, the main camera is simply wow but the other cameras need further updates. Slow motion video recording is not stable at all, the background light blinks too much! Video uploaded!! Wanted to upgrade it to OnePlus 7t but neither Amazon nor the seller could provide that facility.

Name: Sarath
Title: Speed is osam
Comment: Peaks performance

Name: Alfred
Title: Best phone for the price........
Comment: Amazing phone for the priceBut improvements could have been made with the macro camara which is is the worst in the phone.For,the 256GB varient the storage is enough without any expandable slots.Afterall it's one plus.........üñ§

Name: Hari Nair
Title: Don't fall for it, 5G is Far Away......
Comment: My OnePlus 6 still feels & performs way better than this Nord. Not worth the price, Disappointed! Try to get a 7T, 8 or 8 Pro by stretching your budget instead. By the time our networks are 5G ready, there will be way better options available than this one.

Name: Srikanth
Title: Excellent mobile ONE PLUS NORD
Comment: after using samsung a50 mobile. I shifted to one plus nord mobile I ordered the mobile on July 28 th mobile was delivered on 5th July. after one month using the mobile i giving this review about the mobile. mobile is very good  decent colour camera quality battery backup is very good no finger print issues iam recommend to every one Whoever wants to buy this phone should definitely buy it

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Overall I like the product is good but.....
Comment: Phone is good, previously also I used 3T, I'm satisfied,But the issue what I'm facing is during intermittent calls incoming/outgoing calls the other side person is not able to hear my voice, and it's not definately due to network don't rule out that I'm posting it after one month use and I have purchased 2 phones one is 12 GB and other is 8 GB and we're having same kind of issue on both phones.

Name: Omkar D.
Title: Not as expected but still fine
Comment: UI good, charging speed also good.Expected better cameras but both front & back cameras are disappointing as getting lots of noisy blurry images. No zoom for 48mp mode. Not for people looking for camera phone.Display is good.

Name: BILA SETHI
Title: Don't waste your money
Comment: Oneplus 7 is better than oneplus NordLot's of features disappearedAuto call recording is not availableI'm very disappointed this timeüëéüëéüëé

Name: Parth Patel
Title: Camera quality is very poor.
Comment: Speed, display, speaker, battery life is excellent. But camera quality is very poor. Nord have 6 camera set up but not perform very well. I have pixel 2 xl pixel have only one back side, one camera resolution is much batter than Nord 4 back side camera. also with selfie camera. I think company using cheap marketing tactics.

Name: ashwani
Title: Overall a good package
Comment: I have been using OnePlus Nord since over a month now. Overall I am very happy with the purchase but I would be happier if the battery performance can be improved.

Name: menda
Title: Not feel like 1+
Comment: I thought it a beast in mid range.. But not.. After 3 months of use I'm facing lag while rendering contacts it self.. I'm using 12gb/256 gb varient. And the search algorithm is not fast in contacts. Taking long  to respond. Games and all working fine.. Camera 3/5. Doesn't have the feel of 1+.

Name: Nabeel
Title: Go for it!!
Comment: Really good thoughThis phone master pieceCamera insane except macro oneVideo quality and photo quality is dopePerformance on daily usage is seamlessBattery stays around 30 hours in normal usageScreen is insane quality is top-endGaming performance is dope üòú

Name: Sanket More
Title: Plz return my money.. hanging issue, Worst camera - don't buy this...
Comment: 1. I have seen hanging issue in my mobile...Mobile gets automatically restart and stuck at starting logo.. I am not expecting this, very disappointed by one plus.2.Worst camera clearity.. details are not well capture and the macro lens is very very bad.. big failure of one plus for camera... I feel very bad.. why I paid 28k for this phone??

Name: Tejas Joshi
Title: Review after one month use Model 12gb Ram, 256 storage
Comment: Really dissatisfied with this mobile"DO NOT BUY THIS MOBILE"THIRD CLASS CHINESE MOBILEAfter latest software update ring is not ringing when call come, even my mobile on ringing mode... don't getting customer support serviceCAMERA QUALITY IS WORST IN LITTLE LOW LIGHT, FLASH LIGHT IS NOT WORKING IN MANY MODES.WASTE OF MONEY

Name: Himanshu
Title: Good option with this price
Comment: 1. Design of the phone is good.2. Camera is the area where OnePlus need to focus.Main camera is ok but rest are not up to the mark.3. Warp charge & 90Hz display is superb.Overall the handset is ok for this price.

Name: Jesson Rock
Title: Worth the money
Comment: Coolest colour and very smooth to handle.Have tried switching from PUBG (after playing for 2 long hours) and then tried Duo calling for ~30 mins , whatsapp calling for ~10 mins and some music without any impact or lag in handling the apps.. Device seems so smooth and feel like i have got the best version of mobile among many.

Name: Kaushlendra kumar Pandey
Title: All is good but build quality is not good
Comment: Everything is perfect except build quality.Alert slider is very difficult to use as it's frame  is made of plastic and giving cracking sound and paint is chipping out from frame

Name: Dr NARESHKUMAR.V
Title: Need many improvements , not worthful
Comment: Poor performance...need to rectify many issues.Auto wifi calling option no need,Hilighting & visible even after opening of missed calls,Not showing what's app messaging option at calling button when showing number.One plus Customer care not responding on whats app message

Name: gowtham
Title: SEARCHING PROBLEM FOR CONTACT
Comment: The OnePlus nord phone is excellent and super we r satisfied with it. All customers having same problem in phone contacts.Ex: we r searching for one contact we typing last 3 or 4 digitis of that contact it was not showing contact. But it was not happen in another company phone and our one plue model another phones.so please solve the problem.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Don't buy anyone untill sortout this issues.
Comment: Below are the issues I am facing after using 3months-1. Battery discharged within 7-8Hrs.2. Camera quality not that much good.3. After clicking photo still flash not closed it takes 2-5sec more to close flash.4. Night time face sensor not working.5. After clicking Bluetooth on navigation bar, Bluetooth devices not searched in popolup.

Name: Akash Patil
Title: Best Smartphone Under 30k...
Comment: Excellent spec, beautiful design, no major bloat ware, clean OS. Having dual SIM makes sense for a business and personal number. Having 5G makes the device future proof. No lag on phone and ticks all the boxes decent cameras and it will only get better with updates from 1+. included is a phone case and screen protector It's definitely a flagship killer. For the price it's bargain!

Name: Baqir Sheikh
Title: Worth Buying it
Comment: It's first time when I bought a 25k+ mobile & actually it worth ,1.)Camera is amazing in both daylight & nightlight.2.)Processor is avg , as u can run pubg smoothly on 60fps but company has provide only till 40fps which is kinda disappointing.3.) Display quality is excellent & there is no tint issue as many people are saying . It's very smooth thanks to 90Hz HDR 10+ Oled display.

Name: balaji
Title: Good mobile
Comment: This phone is best for day to day usage, battery life is good and the fast charging is not as what OnePlus claim but it is faster and cool , camera quality is good while taking outdoor shots , videos are excellent compared to photos , phone is so smooth and fast I had not faced any lag in games too, display is excellent and awesome ,speaker sound is good and loud

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Value for every‚Çπ
Comment: Awesome displaySmooth performance.but not enough for high end gaming appsVery good user interface.oxygen os is pretty goodSelfie portrait mode,selfie videos are not good enough.normal modes are okRear camera is very good at this price rangeBattery is good enough.warp charging is very effective.If you're more into camera, I'll not recommend this

Name: Shailesh
Title: Battery drain too fast
Comment: Everything thing is good any batteryBattery nt last for a dayI have to charge twice in a day without heavy use that the negative thingsOver all phone is excellent

Name: RAJNISH
Title: Best mid range killer..
Comment: This was OnePlus' chance and they blew it. They should've saved the money on marketing and spent it on better build quality and display. Cheap plastic frame that breaks under stress, and a cheap panel that has rainbow banding and tint at low brightness.

Name: Vijay
Title: Awesome
Comment: Best phone in this price I received two days ago Phone totally look premium.I want to say this is value for money phone better than Samsung a series phones.Gray color look awesome of this phone.If I talk about the camera its good according to price.Everything is good with this phone Happy to have it. Go for it. Thanks one plus and Amazon

Name: Ashish Reddy Chimmula
Title: A good step from Oneplus but with some minor issues
Comment: It's a really good phone in this price range.It is enough for my day to day use and Warp charge is amazing.But when you get the phone for first time you will see a screen protector on screen which is worse.I request who ever is buying or planning to buy this phone just REMOVE SCREEN PROTECTOR and use it there will be no issues.

Name: Unnikrishnan
Title: Good product
Comment: Good product, good battery life, some heating issues but negligable

Name: Aravind Ganesh
Title: Good phone from OnePlus as always.
Comment: Fingerprint reader has improved since 6t. Battery life is good. Warp charging is awesome. Camera is good but the macro lens is disappointing. Othe than that, regular pictures are pretty good.

Name: Rajesh Patel
Title: headphones jack is not working with this device!!
Comment: headphones jack is not working with this device!!

Name: aman
Title: Nice phone!!!
Comment: Battery life is like okay, inscreen fingerprint is actually fast,face lock have a little bug but okay and camera quality  is good and for night photography I'll give 10 on 10 points (but sometimes it take much time to take a good shot so it need to be improve!). Overall phone is quite good with fast and with nice look (especially blue colour ).

Name: nilesh argade
Title: Go for it...
Comment: Writing this review after 3 days of use.1)camera 4.5/52)display 5/53)processor 5/5(I m not heavy gamer)4)battery 5/55)os 5/5Overall good deal..oxygen is smooth n cool.. premium feel in hand...Regarding camera it will fix with updates.**EditedNo tint issue observedNo battery drain isuue

Name: Satish Kumar
Title: My OnePlus Nord
Comment: Everything performance is good in this handset of OnePlus.. only battery drainage is the little problem..I'm satisfied with this product according to features given in it..I must say this is best phone in this price range.

Name: Diptimoy Ghosh
Title: Camera Quality
Comment: 3 star for Camera quality of Nord as expected is not upto that mark, Primary camera is good but Selfie and Night Mode camera is not as decent as expected. Night Images are not at all clear.Overall Oneplus Nord has made a huge hype in the market on camera but could not meet the expectation. Highly expected if the problem can be fixed providing upgraded version on its camera.

Name: Shefin
Title: My usage experience
Comment: It's phone make smooth and fast easly lifeIn my usage camera quality is low light capture bad pic day light it's ok figure print scanner is nicely worcking battery life is good and charging is fast and am first time use oxygen os this os am really love it üíØ it's give a smooth experience and I faced some Network in free fire game I think it's solving in another update..

Name: Digambar salunkhe
Title: Worth buying
Comment: Camera is too good.one of the best display.Giving 7 to 8 hours backup with continuous use.No heating issue.Love the OnePlus nord.Edit after 10 days of use*found heating issue*No any other issue

Name: Karthikeyan
Title: Somehow astonishing
Comment: This is absolutely an excellent phone at 30k with 12gb ram and 256gb rom. The fingerprint reader is genuine as top series as 7t,battery life is enough for one day, somehow in case of camera its is elegant and extraordinary in bright light condition but in full and low light condition it is not much as acceptable as a buyer. And at last thanks for oneplus for this astonishing phone..

Name: Abdul
Title: I highly recommend this device if you're not very particular in getting the best mobile photography.
Comment: A solid device for daily usage with smooth performance by oxygen os. I like the oneplus community were you can post suggestions and issues which might get the attention of the developers for improving the device. Camera is decent, obviously not up to flagship standards. All in all an impressive device with premium feel and experience and only slightly lagging wrt camera performance.

Name: Manik
Title: Over hyped
Comment: Frame is plastic... haven't Expected....+ The YouTube reviews are too much over paid... nothing so great about oxygen OS and nord itself. The camera cut out sucks...it kills content. + I hate the way the upper part darkens while gameplay

Name: Soumya Ranjan Behera
Title: Just go for it
Comment: Pros:-Oxygen OSBrand new Snapdragon 765G SOCSame sensor as op 8Amoled screen1hr to charge fullGreat design weight distribution is greatNFCFeels premiumCons:-Battery life not that great but 30W fast charging balances itProbably it killed OP8OnePlus back to Bringing us Flagship Killers

Title: Best phone of 2020 in 30k
Comment: Bloody good product!!One plus has finally understood that the sub 30k is the sweet spot for them. People prefer Samsung and Apple for anything that's over 40-50kI bought 3T 3+ years back and it worked like a charm. Nord is same price range and definitely a best buy in Sep 2020 for 30k

Name: Souvik
Title: One of the best overall midsegment smartphone
Comment: Well , it is what it is , a midsegment smartphone and it definitely has some setbacks like the 2 useless cameras on the back and the stereo speakers are not there which is kind of true for most of the smartphones in this range and it is like the norm for the midtier smartphone. Hence I would say this is one of the best overall midsegment smartphone.

Name: User123
Title: Calls issue. Defected Microphone.
Comment: Calls not completed. Around 50% calls fail.Recipient unable to hear anything from my side. This happened for around 60% of my calls.Not receiving half of the incoming calls. Getting true caller notification saying incoming call from xyz, but call is not coming through. They had to send a text or make a WhatsApp call (which again had microphone problems)

Name: Rajkannu nataraj
Title: Worth of product
Comment: Awesome product.Camera quality is good especially in nightmodeQuick chargering enough the battery to full just 50 minutesIssuesSpeaker is noisyNo earphone jagBattery will easily empty while always in internetPrice will be little high to compare other productBut otherthan that its ok to use and buy forgot these are chinese products

Name: Parag Mayekar
Title: Good Device
Comment: ¬†I was bit confused between M51, A71 and Nord. 5 days before I received this product and believe me you will enjoy using this device.Display is super awesome.90Hz of refresh rate makes device more smooth. About battery I charge once for an hour and it lasts whole day on normal usage.Camera quality could have been better.
